text: Antonio Hernández Mancha (born 1 April 1951) is a Spanish politician, lawyer and businessman. He was president of the People's Alliance political party and Spain's Leader of the Opposition from 1987 to 1989.La vacuna Hernández Mancha (article published in El País) ==References== ==Other websites== * Article published by Hernández Mancha in El País * El PP ya tiene muertos en el armario: el ‘fantasma’ de Antonio Hernández Mancha (article published in El Confidencial) Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Spanish lawyers
title: Antonio Hernández Mancha
